title: Beauty Dominates the Beast
description: arrogant beastly prince must submit his lustful desires to a willing virgin maiden and unselfishly bring her to her most ultimate pleasure. Could the arrival of the unexpected beauty, vowing to save her brother, be the key to breaking the curse? Beauty Dominates the Beast is the erotic adult retelling of the classic fairy tale Beauty and the Beast.Erotic short story, only for those 18+.
author: Hannah Hale
